mapper.insert: insert into A_AGENT_COLINFO (ID, AGENT_ID, CLO_TYPE, CLO_REALNAME, CLO_BANK, CLO_BANK_BRANCH, CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT, C_TIME, C_UTIME, REMARK, C_USER, CLO_REVIEW_STATUS, STATUS, VARSION, BRANCH_LINE_NUM, ALL_LINE_NUM, BANK_REGION, CLO_TAX_POINT, CLO_INVOICE, CLO_BANK_CODE, PAY_STATUS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cloRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloBankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{varsion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloTaxPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cloInvoice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cloBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update A_AGENT_COLINFO
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_TYPE = #{cloType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_REALNAME = #{cloRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK = #{cloBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK_BRANCH = #{cloBankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{cloBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_UTIME = #{cUtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VARSION = #{varsion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BRANCH_LINE_NUM = #{branchLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALL_LINE_NUM = #{allLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_REGION = #{bankRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_TAX_POINT = #{cloTaxPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_INVOICE = #{cloInvoice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_BANK_CODE = #{cloBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from A_AGENT_COLINFO where AGENT_ID=#{id} and STATUS = 1

select
from A_agent_businfo ab,A_agent_colinfo_rel acr,A_agent_colinfo ac where ab.id = acr.agentbusid and acr.agent_colinfoid = ac.id and ab.id = #{busId} and ac.status=1

select a.AG_UNIQ_NUM, a.AG_NAME, c.ID, c.CLO_TYPE, c.CLO_REALNAME, c.CLO_BANK, c.CLO_BANK_BRANCH, c.CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT, c.C_TIME, c.C_UTIME, c.REMARK, c.C_USER, c.CLO_REVIEW_STATUS, c.STATUS, c.VARSION, c.BRANCH_LINE_NUM, c.ALL_LINE_NUM, c.BANK_REGION, c.CLO_BANK_CODE, c.PAY_STATUS from A_agent a inner join A_agent_colinfo c on c.agent_id = a.id
c.pay_status = #{params.payStatus} and a.ag_status = #{params.agStatus}
